MatchedRegions.transcript: So we propose the memorization discrepancy which is constructed by backtracking the historical models and we studied the empirical properties of memorization discrepancy identifying clean samples from poignant samples.

MatchedRegion.Text: Exploring Model Dynamics for Accumulative Poisoning Discovery

Definition 1. (Memorization Discrepancy). Consider f: Rd Ac that maps the input feature to the C-dimensional simplex, () is perturbed from x on the model f ( ; 0t), and Ot-k means the parameters of the k-interval historical model compared to the current t. Then, we define Memorization Discrepancy on () based on the current parameter At and the historical parameter Ot-k as,
